question: Many people think technological devices such as smart phones, tablets and mobile phones bring more disadvantages than advanatages. To what extent do you agree or disagree?
text: The relevance of the electronic gadgets like mobile phones and tablets is alarmingly on the surge. Some are of the opinion that, it brings more demerits rather than its merits. Nevertheless, I disagree with this statement because of numerous reasons which are going to discuss in this essay.

To begin with, there are so many benefits that can be gained from using an electronic device. Firstly, it moves freely, therefore we can keep it wherever we need to go. Which means people bring it, this for official purposes, parties and also to holy places. Secondly, it provides various features like communication, shopping, paying bills and also for educational purposes. So which means uncountable benefits is imparted from an electronic device. Therefore paying bills through online also reduce time consuming for peoples and also we can communicate with people wherever in the world while we can buy any product which is on the earth. For instance, we can select and buy an American product when sitting at our home in India. So through the devices we get multi various benefits  which are unavoidable in our day to day life.

On the other hand, some people advocate that over executive of electronic gadgets make bad effects in people which is mainly on health issues for example a study in research reveals that there is link between the brain tumour with over executive of gadgets moreover these devices treat some security issues in a nation which means its grabbing some personal details of citizen in a country. For example, recently India prohibited several softwares available in smart phones due to the lack of security. So that over executive would create some sort of demerits in society.

Conclusively there are plenty of upsides belongs to the administration of technological gadgets which we cannot avoid. However there are some negative impacts also it is hoped that the Government should take steps to remove the dark side of technology.
